functions.name: destroy
functions.doc: Destroy the given entity.

functions.name: nav_find
functions.doc:
Find a navigation position.

Supported layers:

-`Normal` (default)

-`Large`

Supported types:

-`ClosestCell` (default)

-`UnblockedCell`

-`FreeCell`

functions.name: target_range_max
functions.doc: Lookup the maximum targeting range of the given entity.

functions.name: heal
functions.doc: Heal the given entity.

functions.name: debug_line
functions.doc: Draw a 3D debug line between the two given points.

functions.name: attack_weapon
functions.doc: Query the current weapon of the given entity.

functions.name: collision_sphere_spawn
functions.doc:
Spawn a collision sphere.

*Note*: Resulting entity is not automatically destroyed.

functions.name: position
functions.doc: Lookup the position of the given entity.

functions.name: light_point_spawn
functions.doc:
Spawn a point light.

*Note*: Resulting entity is not automatically destroyed.

*Note*: It takes one frame before it can be used with the 'light_param()' api.

functions.name: renderable_param
functions.doc:
Change or query a renderable parameter on the given entity.

Required capability: 'Renderable'

Supported parameters:

-`Color`

-`Alpha`

-`Emissive`

functions.name: prefab_id
functions.doc: Lookup the prefab identifier of the given instance, returns null if the entity is not a prefab instance.

functions.name: target_range_min
functions.doc: Lookup the minimum targeting range of the given entity.

functions.name: debug_trace
functions.doc: Emit a debug-trace for this entity with the given values.

functions.name: query_box
functions.doc:
Find all the entities that are touching the given box.

*Note*: Returns a query handle.

Supported options:

-`FactionSelf`

-`FactionOther`

Supported layers:

-`Environment`

-`Destructible`

-`Infantry`

-`Vehicle`

-`Structure`

-`Unit`

-`Debug`

-`AllIncludingDebug`

-`AllNonDebug` (default)

functions.name: name
functions.doc: Lookup the name of the given entity.

functions.name: query_set
functions.doc:
Find all entities in the given set.

*Note*: Returns a query handle.

functions.name: active
functions.doc:
Test if the given entity is performing an activity.

Supported activities:

-`Dead`

-`Moving`

-`Traveling`

-`Attacking`

-`Firing`

-`AttackReadying`

-`AttackAiming`

functions.name: nav_stop
functions.doc:
Instruct the given entity to stop traveling.

Required capability: 'NavTravel'

functions.name: destroy_after
functions.doc:
Destroy the given entity after a delay.

*Note*: When providing an entity it will wait until the entity no longer exists.

functions.name: health
functions.doc: Lookup the health points of the given entity.

functions.name: nav_travel
functions.doc:
Instruct the given entity to travel to a target location or entity.

Required capability: 'NavTravel'

functions.name: vision
functions.doc: Lookup the vision radius of the given entity.

functions.name: renderable_spawn
functions.doc:
Spawn a renderable entity.

*Note*: Resulting entity is not automatically destroyed.

*Note*: It takes one frame before it can be used with the 'renderable_param()' api.

functions.name: nav_target
functions.doc: Lookup the current navigation target of the given entity. Either a position or an entity.

functions.name: debug_orientation
functions.doc: Draw a 3D orientation gizmos.

functions.name: query_pop
functions.doc: Pops the first query value, returns null when reaching the end of the query.

functions.name: sound_spawn
functions.doc:
Spawn a sound instance.

*Note*: Resulting entity is not automatically destroyed.

*Note*: It takes one frame before it can be used with the 'sound_param()' api.

functions.name: target_primary
functions.doc: Lookup the primary target of the given entity.

functions.name: damage
functions.doc: Deal damage to the given entity.

functions.name: query_random
functions.doc: Return a random remaining value in the given query, returns null when the current query is empty.

functions.name: debug_input_rotation
functions.doc:
Lookup the rotation at the debug input ray.

Supported options:

-`FactionSelf`

-`FactionOther`

Supported layers:

-`Environment`

-`Destructible`

-`Infantry`

-`Vehicle`

-`Structure`

-`Unit`

-`Debug`

-`AllIncludingDebug`

-`AllNonDebug` (default)

functions.name: scale
functions.doc: Lookup the scale of the given entity.

functions.name: debug_log
functions.doc: Log the given values.

functions.name: random_of
functions.doc: Return a random (non-null) value from the given arguments.

functions.name: debug_input_position
functions.doc:
Lookup the position at the debug input ray.

Supported options:

-`FactionSelf`

-`FactionOther`

Supported layers:

-`Environment`

-`Destructible`

-`Infantry`

-`Vehicle`

-`Structure`

-`Unit`

-`Debug`

-`AllIncludingDebug`

-`AllNonDebug` (default)

functions.name: prefab_spawn
functions.doc:
Spawn a prefab.

*Note*: Resulting entity is not automatically destroyed.

functions.name: attack_target
functions.doc: Query the current attack target of the given entity.

functions.name: capable
functions.doc:
Test if the given entity has a specific capability.

Supported capabilities:

-`NavTravel`

-`Animation`

-`Attack`

-`Status`

-`Teleport`

-`Bark`

-`Renderable`

-`Vfx`

-`Light`

-`Sound`

functions.name: health_stat
functions.doc:
Lookup a health stat of the given entity.

Supported stats:

-`DealtDamage`

-`DealtHealing`

-`Kills`

functions.name: velocity
functions.doc: Lookup the velocity of the given entity.

functions.name: joint_position
functions.doc:
Lookup the world position of a joint on the given entity.

*Note*: Animation update from this frame is not taken into account.

functions.name: exists
functions.doc:
Test if the given entity still exists.

*Note*: Returns false if input value is null.

functions.name: sound_param
functions.doc:
Change or query a sound parameter on the given entity.

Required capability: 'Sound'

Supported parameters:

-`Gain`

-`Pitch`

functions.name: target_exclude
functions.doc:
Test if the given target exclude option is set.

Supported options:

-`Unreachable`

-`Obscured`

functions.name: rotation
functions.doc: Lookup the rotation of the given entity.

functions.name: debug_box
functions.doc: Draw a 3D debug box.

functions.name: collision_box_spawn
functions.doc:
Spawn a collision box.

*Note*: Resulting entity is not automatically destroyed.

functions.name: debug_sphere
functions.doc: Draw a 3D debug sphere.

functions.name: visible
functions.doc: Check if the given position is visible for this faction.

functions.name: vfx_system_spawn
functions.doc:
Spawn a vfx system.

*Note*: Resulting entity is not automatically destroyed.

*Note*: It takes one frame before it can be used with the 'vfx_param()' api.

functions.name: status
functions.doc:
Change or query if an entity is affected by the specified status.

Supported status:

-`Burning`

-`Bleeding`

-`Healing`

-`Veteran`

functions.name: faction
functions.doc:
Lookup or change the faction of the given entity.

Supported factions:

-`FactionA`

-`FactionB`

-`FactionC`

-`FactionD`

-`FactionNone`

functions.name: attach
functions.doc: Attach the given entity to another entity (optionally at a specific joint).

functions.name: ask
functions.doc:
Ask a target entity for a property value.

*Note*: The result value is visible to this entity under the same key in the next frame.

functions.name: light_param
functions.doc:
Change or query a light parameter on the given entity.

Required capability: 'Light'

Supported parameters:

-`Radiance`

functions.name: debug_text
functions.doc:
Draw debug text at a position in 3D space.

*Note*: Size is in UI canvas pixels.

functions.name: debug_break
functions.doc: Break into the debugger if there is one attached.

functions.name: attack
functions.doc:
Instruct the given entity to attack another entity.
Note: Changing targets can take some time if the entity is currently mid-attack.

Required capability: 'Attack'

functions.name: teleport
functions.doc:
Teleport the given entity.

Required capability: 'Teleport'

functions.name: query_sphere
functions.doc:
Find all the entities that are touching the given sphere.

*Note*: Returns a query handle.

Supported options:

-`FactionSelf`

-`FactionOther`

Supported layers:

-`Environment`

-`Destructible`

-`Infantry`

-`Vehicle`

-`Structure`

-`Unit`

-`Debug`

-`AllIncludingDebug`

-`AllNonDebug` (default)

functions.name: self
functions.doc: Return the entity that is executing the current script.

functions.name: line_of_sight
functions.doc:
Test if there is a clear line of sight between the given entities.
Note: Returns the distance to the target.

functions.name: bark
functions.doc:
Request a bark to be played.

Required capability: 'Bark'

Supported types:

-`Death`

-`Confirm`

functions.name: detach
functions.doc: Detach the given entity from all other entities.

functions.name: set
functions.doc: Change or query if the target entity is contained in the given set.

functions.name: vfx_decal_spawn
functions.doc:
Spawn a decal.

*Note*: Resulting entity is not automatically destroyed.

*Note*: It takes one frame before it can be used with the 'vfx_param()' api.

functions.name: debug_input_entity
functions.doc:
Lookup the entity at the debug input ray.

Supported options:

-`FactionSelf`

-`FactionOther`

Supported layers:

-`Environment`

-`Destructible`

-`Infantry`

-`Vehicle`

-`Structure`

-`Unit`

-`Debug`

-`AllIncludingDebug`

-`AllNonDebug` (default)

functions.name: debug_arrow
functions.doc: Draw a 3D debug arrow.

functions.name: vfx_param
functions.doc:
Change or query a vfx parameter on the given entity.

Required capability: 'Vfx'

Supported parameters:

-`Alpha`

-`EmitMultiplier`

functions.name: anim_param
functions.doc:
Change or query an animation parameter on the given entity.

Required capability: 'Animation'

Supported parameters:

-`Time`

-`TimeNorm`

-`Speed`

-`Weight`

-`Active`

-`Loop`

-`FadeIn`

-`FadeOut`

-`Duration`

functions.name: time
functions.doc:
Lookup the current time.

Supported clocks:

-`Time` (default)

-`RealTime`

-`Delta`

-`RealDelta`

-`Ticks`

functions.name: tell
functions.doc:
Set a property value for the given entity.

*Note*: The updated property is visible to scripts in the next frame.
